snippet: With a new album full of songs focused on exercise and healthy eating, hip-hop artists enlist in Michelle Obama’s battle against childhood obesity.
abstract: Several hip-hop artists are volunteering to contribute songs to an album inspired by Michelle Obama's work fighting childhood obesity.
lead_paragraph: With a new album full of songs focused on exercise and healthy eating, hip-hop artists enlist in Michelle Obama’s battle against childhood obesity.

headline.main: Music Stars Join First Lady to Get Youths Off the Couch
headline.print_headline: Music Stars Join First Lady To Get Youths Off the Couch
